heading: Today
text: Some morning sun, giving way to increasing clouds.  Not as cold.  Highs in the upper teens to low 20s north, in the 20s south.  Winds becoming south near 10 mph east, and 10 to 15 mph from the Green Mountains west, gusting 20 to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy, with some light snow or snow showers from the Adirondacks and Rt. 4 north, a dusting to an inch.  A few snow showers south.  Not as cold.  Lows in the teens, a few single numbers northeast, and low 20s west.  Winds southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west, diminishing to less than 10 mph east.

heading: Wednesday
text: Periods of snow or snow showers, mixing with rain south of Rt. 4, and through the Champlain Valley in the afternoon. Amounts of 1 to 3 inches in the valleys and south, 2 to 5 inches over higher elevations.  Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s north, in the 30s south.  Winds becoming south to southeast 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph from the Green Mountains west.
